item.title: add(bug 58216)
item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 58216) - provide picture-shape resize that maintains the aspect ratio

item.title: add(bug 57925)
item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 57925) - Add a simple fix to avoid an NPE when Workbooks have invalid external references

item.title: add(bug 57915)
item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 57915) - Fix Dev2Hex for numbers larger than Integer.MAX_VALUE and less than Integer.MIN_VALUE

item.title: add(bug 57890)
item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 57890) - Add support for different datatypes in XSSFImportFromXML

item.title: add(bug 58207)
item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 58207) - Provide user access to the original image dimensions

item.title: add(bug 58245)
item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 58245) - Workbook support for iterating over Sheets

item.title: fix(bug 58353)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 58353) - Return correct value in Match-Function with match-type == -1

item.title: fix(bug 58315)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 58315) - Avoid NPE for RichTextString without font-details

item.title: fix(bug 53275)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 53275) - XSSFFont: reset indexed color flag when setting a non-indexed color

item.title: fix(bug 58039)
item.description: fix by David North (bug 58039) - Make DGet and DMin function implementations thread-safe

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI Developers - Fix DAYS360 handling for US/EU method

item.title: fix(bug 58254)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 58254) - CellFormatResult.text should check for nulls as per the javadoc

item.title: fix(bug 58260)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 58260) - Fix checks for limit on number of styles in XSSF/SXSSF, fix more than 32k styles in SXSSF workbooks

item.title: fix(bug 58262)
item.description: fix by David North (bug 58262) - ReadOnlySharedStringsTable now handles workbooks with an empty SST part

item.title: fix(bug 52111)
item.description: fix by David North (bug 52111) - Intersection formulae are now supported in XSSF

item.title: fix(bug 58253)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 58253) - CellReference upper-case check for #REF!, and javadoc improvements

item.title: fix(bug 58252)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 58252) - More CellReference unit testing coverage

item.title: fix(bug 54938)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 54938) - Throw InvalidFormatException as documented instead of IllegalArgumentException in WorkbookFactory.create()

item.title: fix(bug 58237)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 58237) - When adding a picture to a XWPF header or footer, attach it to the right part

item.title: fix(bug 58220)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 58220) - Improve the javadocs for XSSFFont and Font getFontHeight methods

item.title: fix(bug 56479)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 56479) - Don't hardcode dcterms as namespace alias in the attribute, but expect the actual alias that is used in the corresponding element

item.title: fix(bug 56519)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 56519) - XSLFSlide.draw is not working with text embeded in PPTX

item.title: fix(bug 58205)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 58205) - getSlideMasters() returns the master slides in the incorrect order

item.title: fix(bug 57786)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 57786) - XSLFFreeformShape ignores quadratic bezier curves

item.title: fix(bug 58206)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 58206) - provide a mechanism to find slide layouts by name

item.title: fix(bug 58204)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 58204) - STYLE: ShapeContainer interface makes internal getShapesList() redundant

item.title: add(bug 58190)
item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 58190) - The current picture handling uses raw integers for types and index, replace with enum and reference

item.title: fix(bug 58203)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 58203) - Apparently Maven uses plurals for all artifacts except javadocs, so tweak our naming to make it happy

item.title: add(bug 58193)
item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 58193) - Use input stream rather than byte array for checksum etc.

item.title: add(bug 58200)
item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 58200) - SXSSF support for evaluating formula cells, provided the cell and all its references are within the current window

item.title: fix(bug 58098)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 58098) - Avoid NPE in cleanup if NPOIFSFileSystem is opened on a locked File under Windows

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI Developers - Merged common_sl branch to trunk

item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 57571) - Fix creating comments for XSSF/SXSSF, regression was introduced via bug 54920

item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 58175) - Fix creating comments for XSSF/SXSSF, regression was introduced via bug 54920

item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 58156) - Possible data corruption in hasPOIFSHeader and hasOOXMLHeader

item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 57484) - Allow processing of non-OOXML core namespace packages

item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 58130) - Conditional Formatting support for DataBars, Icon Sets / Multi-States, and Color Scales
